titleStmt.title: The petition and articles exhibited in Parliament against Iohn Pocklington, doctor in divinity, parson of Yelden in Befordshire, Anno 1641
titleStmt.author: I. H.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: The petition was brought into the House of Lords by "I. H., of Cardington in the county of Bedford, gentleman."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
